title: The Big Picture Of The Fast-Food Wage Dispute
teaser: The 150-city protest for a minimum wage hike comes at a time when other changes are putting more pressure on businesses to pay their workers more. Home health care workers joining the fight also raises the issue of overtime rules, which are expected out from the Labor Department in November.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
